thread.title: Maria
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text: Your first impressions /experience.. Will always determine whether you will be back to that store or not. Gizelle gave us such excellent service, explained and described the product so well that we couldn't resist buying what we did. Besides, they have beautiful furniture and unbelievable low prices!! We're definitely going back..
